name: クリア
message: "I'm sorry. I wasn't trying to kill him. Really."

name: 蒼葉
message: "More importantly, we've gotta keep a low profile. We're screwed if they catch us before we get to Toue."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And just so you know, I can take a few hits just fine. You look out for yourself, too."

name: クリア
message: "I'm very sorry for causing you so much trouble..."
He looks pathetic, like a scolded puppy. I gently pat his head.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, the important thing is that you understand. Don't beat yourself up over it."

name: クリア
message: "I just realized something! Please look out the window!"
I look out the window, but I don't see anything of interest.

name: クリア
message: "So I think I'll be going to bed now!"
With that, Clear leans back into the couch and folds his hands in his lap.
...I fight the urge to punch him.
He better not be grinning under that stupid mask of his...
I bet he is grinning under there, pretending to snore like an asshole.
Thinking to get back at him, I reach for his mask...
